name: Pig Racing: Fart Your Way To The Finish Line!
name_original: Pig Racing: Fart Your Way To The Finish Line!
description:
Race through the levels with your Cheeky Pig! Pick up weapons, fire fireballs and leave big stinkin' piles of pig poo behind for your rival pigs to slip on!

"This game is inspired by Real Pig Racing, if you love the game make sure you check out a real life pig race. They're hilarious!"

Pig Racing is a simple style top down driving game. It's funny and addictive which makes it a hell of a lot different to all those other driving games.

Items/Weapons are picked up during the race. You can fire a fireball or heat seaking missile to attack opponent's pigs. For some special items, you can even enlarge your pig and make a MUMMA PIG to run over your rivals.

To unlock the next stage, you need to play the Championship mode (on either one difficulty) and get a bright shiny gold cup (1st) in the last stage you unlocked.

Featuring:
-Cheeky Pig Racing
-5 different environments
-25 unique tracks
-7 items/weapons
-AI opponent pigs
-Single race (solo/vs CPU) or Championship mode
-Super Easy, Easy, Normal, Hard, Nightmare difficulty settings
-Hidden Dark mode
-Portrait/Landscape mode
-Control by touch or by tilt
-Auto gas option
-items/weapons on/off option
-Resume game option
-Saved best time for each track
-Openfeint integrated (Global scores for each track)

-------------------

REVIEWS:
"This game just keeps on making me laugh. Those fat little piggies!!"

“Pig Racing has everything a normal driving game has with more fun and comedy chucked in”

"Like pick up and play games? Then you definitely shouldn't miss Pig Racing"
